metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4360 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Color in Google Chrome prior to116.0.5845.96 allowed a remote attacker to obfuscate security UI via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
